snippet.title: Baten Kaitos Ⅰ&Ⅱ HD Remaster – Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Experience a remastered collection of the classic RPGs that were originally released on Nintendo GameCube when Baten Kaitos Ⅰ & Ⅱ HD Remaster soars onto #NintendoSwitch this summer!

Wings of the Heart Take Flight Once More

Unearth the mysteries of the skies above and reclaim the lost ocean below in two timeless RPGs, remastered in HD. Baten Kaitos: Eternal Wings and the Lost Ocean and Baten Kaitos Origins are back with improved graphics and new features to aid game progression, making them even more accessible for new players.

Learn more: https://bnent.eu/BatenKaitos

Follow us on:
Web: https://www.bandainamcoent.eu
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bandainamcoeu
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Bandainamcoeu 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/bandainamcoeu
